ã€Story of Unrequited Loveã€‘
Kamata, a man living in a certain village, lost his father when he was little.
Meanwhile, Usa a girl living in the same village, also lost her mother when she was little.Kamata's mother was a single mother, and Usa's father was a single father.
One day, rumors spread throughout the village that Kamata's mother had been spying on Usa's house. It seemed that she had a crush on Usa's father.
Meanwhile, Kamata also has feelings for Usa, and thinks that if his mother and Usa's father get together, his love will come to fruition. He plots to bring the two closer together, but...

What will become of the love between Kamata and Usa, and their mother and father?

[Story of Chatan Shibee]
Jiraa is a young man from Chatan Village with a scar (Shibee) over his mouth.  So people called him Chatan Shibee.
Lived in poverty, he stoled 2 soaps and was jailed.  After serving his time, he mended his ways and moved to Kume island to restart his life. However, public disturbances arose on the island when people started to suspect Jiraa (Chatan Shibee) for frequent thefts happening in the community since his arrivalâ€¦
â€œStory of Chatan Shibeeâ€ is a masterpiece by renowned Okinawa actor OGIMI Kotaro that captures social issues like prejudice and discrimination. This play is revived with new casts after about 30 years.

[Bo Shibari /Tied to a stick]
Taraa and Sanraa are servants who love alcohol.  They cannot keep themselves away from sipping Sake when their master is away.  Knowing their appetite for Sake, the master tied their arms to a stick then left, thinking now they cannot touch his Sake.  He underestimated Taraa and Sanaa for their zeal for drinking.  When the master returned, he found both of them singing and dancing and happily drunkâ€¦
This piece is a remake of Japanese KyÅgen play to a humorous Uchinaa Shibai.
Please enjoy!

[Story of Mimura Dance]
Hearing rumors about a beautiful girl named Chirugwa who lives in Naha, three men from the three villages of Itoman, Oroku and Chatan head to Naha hoping to make her their bride.
Not knowing where to go and in a difficult position, they explain their situation to a man from Naha who happens to be passing by and he helps them out.
The three young men somehow make it to Chirugwa's house and compete in arm wrestling and other games to make Chirugwa their bride, but they just can't decide.
What will happen next? Please enjoy the comedy "Mimura Dance."
